fixes.name: Cuenta de mujeres
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR CountFem =
    CALCULATE(
        COUNTROWS('historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'),
        'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Sexo egresados] = "Femenino",
        ALLEXCEPT(
            'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)',
            'historicoEducacionCLEAN (historicoEducacionCLEAN)'[Identificacion]
        )
    )
RETURN
    CountFem
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the FIXED LOD that counts rows with Sexo egresados = "Femenino" per Identificacion into a measure. Used CALCULATE with a boolean filter for Sexo egresados and ALLEXCEPT to fix the calculation at the Identificacion level, returning the count of matching rows.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD ({ FIXED ... }), which is an aggregate/context-based calculation. Per the rules, LOD expressions must be implemented as measures in Power BI.
